Articles.Content: I was playing KSP the other day and I ran out of Kerbals to banish into space. I noticed though that there was a button that said "change suit". I thought this was a figment of my imagination so I went on my merry way. Then the next day I ran out of Kerbals again. So I retrieved some but I saw that "change suit button" again! So I decided to report this. I'm not sure it this is necessary but I'm assuming Squad mad a mistake in code. Oh. By the way on playing On Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition PlayStation 4. If that helps. Thanks!

On 10/8/2020 at 2:12 PM, Dr. Kerbal said:

I was playing KSP the other day and I ran out of Kerbals to banish into space. I noticed though that there was a button that said "change suit". I thought this was a figment of my imagination so I went on my merry way. Then the next day I ran out of Kerbals again. So I retrieved some but I saw that "change suit button" again! So I decided to report this. I'm not sure it this is necessary but I'm assuming Squad mad a mistake in code. Oh. By the way on playing On Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition PlayStation 4. If that helps. Thanks!

Put this on the bugtracker, found here: https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/projects/ksp/issues

Or make a post in the PS4 support forum, it's not really going to be found and fixed if you put it here.
